channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- RHEL-8 based Middleware Containers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- RHEL-8 based Middleware Containers

item.title: CVE-2022-4039|2024-09-24T14:29:55.579Z -- red%20hat -- rhel-8%20based%20middleware%20containers
item.description: A flaw was found in Red Hat Single Sign-On for OpenShift container images, which are configured with an unsecured management interface enabled. This flaw allows an attacker to use this interface to deploy malicious code and access and modify potentially sensitive information in the app server configuration.
